title: Part 1 Chapter 12 A Newspaper Paragraph
content: Extracted from the Hobart Town Courier of the 12th November, 1827:—

book.title: For the Term of His Natural Life 无期徒刑
book.description: 简介： My Dear Sir Charles, I take leave to dedicate this work to you, not merely because your nineteen years of political and literary life in Australia render it very fitting that any work written by a resident in the colonies, and having to do...
